Title: Kick It Down The Road
Text: Move all Tickets from any Feature to any other Feature.

Title: Hawaii Team Retreat
Text: Anyone can discard any number of cards and remove that many Bugs.

Title: Kanban Tetris
Text: Take all Tickets from 2 Features and place them back in any order, at least 1 Ticket on each of those Features.

Title: Brand Guidelines
Text: Count currently open DESIGN Tickets. Put that many counters on any 1 DESIGN Ticket.

Title: Dead Bug Redemption
Text: Remove 1 Bug from each Ticket or Feature that has Bugs.

Title: Illiterate Programming
Text: Close any TECH Ticket that has no counters on it. If there is another Ticket below, put 2 Bugs on it.

Title: Hydra Management
Text: Close all Tickets on any Feature. Add twice as many Tickets to any adjacent Feature.

Title: Hackathon
Text:
Everyone rolls a die. Sum up the results.

Subtract the number of cards in players' hands.
Subtract the number of non-Completed Features.

If the result is still positive, put that many counters on any Tickets you want.

Title: Tech Debt
Text:
Close any TECH Ticket. Roll a die.

On 1-2: put 2 new Tickets on the same Feature.

On 3-4: put 3 Bugs on the Feature or Ticket below.

Title: Creatine Microdosing
Text: Draw 1 card and do 2 more actions right now.

Title: Refactoring
Text:
Move 1 Feature with all its Tickets to a differnt valid place in the Product.

Add 1 extra Ticket on top of it. (Even if the Feature was completed.)

Title: Heavy Refactoring
Text:
Move up to 2 Features with all their Tickets to different valid places in the Product.

Add 2 extra Tickets on top of each. (Even if either of the Features was completed.)

Title: Full Stack Jack
Text: Place 2 counters on 1 Ticket of each category: TECH, MARKETING, and DESIGN. (6 counters in total.)

Title: Outsource
Text:
Put this card in front of you. Place 1 counter on it.

At the beginning of your turn, roll a die. On 3-6, add 1 counter. On 1-2, remove 1 counter. If cannot remove it, discard this card.

On your turn, you may discard this card and put all counter from it on Tickets of your choice. (That won't spend your action.)

Title: Fast-Track
Text: If you have a Feature in your hand, you can place it right now. Put half the required number of Tickets on it (rounding up).

Title: We're Almost There
Text: Discard top 5 cards from the Runway Deck. Add 1 counter to the Deadline of the current Milestone.

Title: Bug Runner 2049
Text: Roll a die. On 1-2, remove 1 Bug. On 3-4, remove 3 Bugs. On 5-6, remove 3 Bugs.

Title: Better Call Claude
Text: Negate a Problem card. You can play this card at any time when a Problem is revealed.
